name: StormRend - Realm in Ruin
description:
Gather 'round the campfire and allow me to regale you with this tale of heroism and valour!

It begins at the World Tree; we all know it's life-giving roots spread across the Realms, sustaining us. But, a dark force has its sight set on destroying it: Frost Trolls, wicked creatures of malformed intent, who exist only to destroy! With the fate of the Realms at stake, the gods summoned their Champions to come to its aid.  

It is here where our story begins - at the base of the World Tree -  with our three Champions, the evil Frost Trolls, and most importantly... you!

Defeat the Frost Trolls, defend the World Tree and save the Realms from being plunged into an Eternal Winter in this Norse-mythology inspired turn-based tactics game. 

Features
  • Completely deterministic combat: no random chance
  • Deep and complex combat systems
  • Three unique Champions with vastly different movesets
  • Gorgeous hand-painted art style
  • Four levels with increasing difficulty
  • Fully voice-acted
